subject: U.S.A GOVERNMENT,WORLD BANK,
body:
U.S.A GOVERNMENT,WORLD BANK,UNITED NATION ORGANIZATION OFFICIAL APPROVAL ACCRUED INTEREST PAYMENT VALUED US$587,491.00.
Attn: Sir/Madam
I wish to find out if your accrued interest funds of (US$587,491.00) have been paid to you by the paying bank as reported in our Payment database? Confirm the status to me by E-mail: 
ingsdaniel863@gmail.com
If I did not receive any response from you within the next 48 hours, we shall assume your accrued interest funds of US$587,491.00 (Five Hundred And Eighty-Five Thousand, Four Hundred And Ninety-One US Dollars) have been successfully received by you.
Regards
Mrs. Theresa Brown
UNITED NATION,USA.
United Nation Grant Alleviation Allocation Programme (UNGAAP) Agent.

subject: Re:   U.S.A GOVERNMENT,WORLD BANK,
body:
Hello Mrs. Theresa Brown,

Thank you for reaching out to me regarding this matter. I must admit, I'm a bit surprised by your message as I wasn't aware of any accrued interest funds in my name. Could you please provide more details about this? How did these funds come to be and why are they associated with my name?

I look forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Melanie
